desktop.lead: Visit drawmote.app on your phone, enter the following code and start drawing! For the best experience both devices should be in the same network.
desktop.countdownPrefix: New code will be generated in
desktop.tooManyAttempts: There was an error generating a pairing code. This can happen if too many requests to generate a code were made. Please wait a bit and try again later.

mobile.lead: Visit drawmote.app on your computer or tablet to get a pairing code and start drawing.
mobile.codeInvalid: The entered code is not valid.
mobile.controllingInfo: Point your phone at your screen and press the circle to draw or click a button. Slide up or down to change a slider.

webRTC.label: WebRTC
webRTC.supported: Low latency connection between both devices.
webRTC.unsupported: Unfortunately your browser doesn't support WebRTC. This is required for the best experience.

webSocket.label: WebSocket
webSocket.supported: This is used as a fallback to WebRTC. High latency is likely, resulting in a noticeable delay.
webSocket.unsupported: Your browser doesn't support native WebSocket connections. It's likely that you won't be able to use this app.

gyroscope.label: Gyroscope
gyroscope.supported: Your phone can be used to draw on a screen.
gyroscope.unsupported: No gyroscope could be detected. Drawing won't be possible.

canvasFilter.label: Canvas Filter
canvasFilter.supported: All brush features can be used.
canvasFilter.unsupported: You won't be able to use all brush features.

connection.title: Restore your last connection
connection.text: Click the big red button on both devices to quickly reestablish a connection between them.
